Question: Empower IoT CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
KIOXIA America, Inc.

Empower IoT CES 2024

- Highlighting extensive portfolio of solid state drives (SSDs) and memory solutions
- Diverse lineup suited for various flash-based solutions, including new products, form factors, and standards
- Focus on technological innovation to meet evolving standards and end user expectations
- Showcase at CES 2024 includes exhibits on Level 4 of the Venetian® Meeting Center

For more information, visit www.kioxia.com.
Summary_cn:
KIOXIA美国公司。

赋予物联网CES 2024

- 突出展示丰富的固态硬盘（SSDs）和存储解决方案组合
- 多样化产品系列，适用于各种基于闪存的解决方案，包括新产品、形态和标准
- 专注于技术创新，以满足不断演变的标准和终端用户期望
- 在CES 2024上的展示包括威尼斯人®会议中心四楼的展区

欲了解更多信息，请访问www.kioxia.com。
